MonkAI_agent.core package

Submodules

MonkAI_agent.core.base module

class MonkAI_agent.core.base.AgentManager(client, agents_creators: list[MonkaiAgentCreator], context_variables=None, stream=False, debug=False)[source]

Bases: object

Manages the interaction with AI agents.

This class is responsible for managing the lifecycle of AI agents, handling user interactions, processing tool calls, and managing context variables.

agent

The current agent instance.

agents_creators

A list of agent creators to initialize the triage agent.

client

The client instance to use for the agent.

context_variables

Context variables for the agent.

debug

Flag to enable debugging.

get_chat_completion(agent: Agent, history: List, context_variables: dict, model_override: str, stream: bool, debug: bool) → ChatCompletionMessage[source]

Generates a chat completion based on the user message and conversation history.

Returns:

The generated chat completion.

Return type:

Completion

get_triage_agent()[source]

Returns the triage agent.

Returns:

The triage agent instance.

Return type:

Agent

handle_function_result(result, debug) → Result[source]

Handles the result of a function call, updating context variables and processing the result.

Returns:

The response after handling the function result.

Return type:

PartialResponse

handle_tool_calls(tool_calls: List[ChatCompletionMessageToolCall], functions: List[Callable[[], str | Agent | dict]], context_variables: dict, debug: bool) → Response[source]

Handles tool calls by executing the corresponding functions.

Parameters:

  • tool_calls (list) – List of tool calls to handle.

  • functions (list) – List of functions that the agent can perform.

  • context_variables (dict) – Context variables for the agent.

  • debug (bool) – Flag to enable debugging.

Returns:

The response after handling the tool calls.

Return type:

Response

async run(user_message: str, user_history: list = None, agent=None, model_override='gpt-4o') → Response[source]
Executes the main workflow:

  • Handles the conversation with the user.

  • Manages the interaction with the agent.

  • Processes tool calls and updates context variables.

Returns:

The response from the agent after processing the user message.

Return type:

Response

stream

Flag to enable streaming response.

triage_agent_criator

The creator for the triage agent.

MonkAI_agent.core.config module

MonkAI_agent.core.monkai_agent_creator module

class MonkAI_agent.core.monkai_agent_creator.MonkaiAgentCreator[source]

Bases: ABC

Abstract class for creating agent instances.

This class provides a blueprint for creating different types of agents based on the system’s needs. It includes methods to create an agent instance and to provide a brief description of the agent’s capabilities.

abstract get_agent() → Agent[source]

Creates and returns an instance of an agent.

abstract get_agent_briefing() → str[source]

Returns a brief description of the agent’s capabilities.

async MonkAI_agent.core.repl.run_demo_loop(manager: AgentManager, context_variables={}, model='gpt-4o', stream=False, debug=False) → None[source]

Runs the demo loop for interacting with the MonkAI Agent.

Parameters:

  • manager (AgentManager) – The manager instance to run the agent.

  • context_variables (dict, optional) – Context variables for the agent. Defaults to {}.

  • model (str, optional) – The model to use for the agent. Defaults to “gpt-4o”.

  • stream (bool, optional) – Flag to enable streaming response. Defaults to False.

  • debug (bool, optional) – Flag to enable debugging. Defaults to False.

MonkAI_agent.core.security module

MonkAI_agent.core.security.validate(validation_func)[source]

MonkAI_agent.core.triage_agent_creator module

class MonkAI_agent.core.triage_agent_creator.TriageAgentCreator(agents_creator: list[MonkaiAgentCreator])[source]

Bases: MonkaiAgentCreator

Class for creating triage agents.

This class inherits from MonkaiAgentCreator and is responsible for creating triage agents that decide which agent should handle the user’s request. It provides methods to create the triage agent and to provide a description of its capabilities.

get_agent() → Agent[source]

Creates and returns an instance of a triage agent.

get_agent_briefing() → str[source]

Returns a brief description of the triage agent’s capabilities.

MonkAI_agent.core.types module

class MonkAI_agent.core.types.Agent(*, name: str = 'Agent', model: str = 'gpt-4o', instructions: str | Callable[[], str] = 'You are a helpful agent.', functions: List[Callable[[], str | Agent | dict]] = [], tool_choice: str = None, parallel_tool_calls: bool = True, external_content: bool = False)[source]

Bases: BaseModel

Represents a function that an agent can perform.

external_content: bool

Whether the agent can use external content.

functions: List[Callable[[], str | Agent | dict]]

List of functions the agent can perform.

instructions: str | Callable[[], str]

Instructions for the agent.

model: str

The model used by the agent.

model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

name: str

Name of Agent

parallel_tool_calls: bool

Whether the agent can make parallel tool calls.

tool_choice: str

The tool choice for the agent.
